post.description: Provides a set of results which match the posted query.
Updates code search index with index/delete of files specified in the bulk index request.
Gets the list of files present in the repository along with its metadata.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to get files and its metadata.

get.description: Get file content given the details about the file that uniquely identifies it
Gets the list of folders present in the path specified for the given project and repository.
Gets the operation status represented by the specified tracking id

post.description: Registers the custom repository (from third-party version control system) with VSO Search Service

get.description: Get custom repositories available in the given project
Get custom repository represented by specified project and repository name
Gets the collection names participating in the specified tenant

post.description: Provides a set of results which match the posted query.
Provides a set of results which match the posted query.

get.description: Provides a list of repositories accessible to the user making the call under the specified project. If no project identifier is provided, all accessible repositories under the collection are returned.

post.description: Provides a set of results which match the posted query.

accepted.description: Flag that determines whether the request was accepted or not

errors.description: List of errors (if any) that needs to be sent to the client

trackingId.description: Tracking id to check the progress of the operation later

branch.description: Branch of the result file. TODO : [hapahuja] - This field is deprecated.

changeId.description: ChangeId is the Id of last change in the result file.

hitCount.description: TODO : [hapahuja] - This field is deprecated. Number of hits in the result file.

hits.description: TODO : [hapahuja] -This field is deprecated. List of hit offsets in the result file.

matches.description: Dictionary of field to hit offsets in the result file. key identifies the area in which hit's were found, for ex: file content/file name etc. In subsequent sprints, Hits defined above will be a member of this.

path.description: Path at which result file is present.

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the result file. If not accessible or of type TFVC it is null

vcType.description: Version Control type of the result file. It returns 'Git' or 'Tfvc' type.

collections.description: List of collections detail participating in the given tenant

filters.description: Filters to be passed with query. Set it to null if there are no filters to be applied.

searchFilters.description: Filters to be passed with query. Set it to null if there are no filters to be applied.

searchText.description: Search Text for which Search is performed.

skipResults.description: For supporting pagination. SkipResults tells the number of results to be skipped.

sortOptions.description: Options for sorting in the search results. If set to null, the results will be sorted by relevance.

takeResults.description: For supporting pagination. TakeResults tells the number of results to be returned.

errors.description: List of errors (if any) that needs to be sent to the client

filterCategories.description: Filter Categories (if any) sent in the response

field.description: Field name on which sorting should be done.

sortOrder.description: Order in which the results should be sorted. When set it automatically sets sortOrder enum value. This is required since the controller does not allow enum members to be passed by their names.

operation.description: Operation type that needs to be performed

path.description: File path where the file is present

paginationInfo.description: Pagination information required to fetch the metadata from Search Service.

requiredMetadata.description: List of metadata that is required.

paginationInfo.description: Pagination information required to fetch the metadata from Search Service.

charOffset.description: Gets or sets the start character offset of a piece of text.

length.description: Gets or sets the length of a piece of text.

pageId.description: In context of FileMetaDataRequest: Keeps Id of the page to be fetched. In context of FileMetaDataResponse: Keeps Id of the next page to be fetched.

results.description: ProjectSearchResults returned as part of the response.

hits.description: Hit Offsets for highlighting in the description field.

parentProjectName.description: Name of Parent Project, useful in case of a type 'Repository'.

type.description: Flag which tells if this entity is a 'Project' or 'Repository'.

count.description: Number of matched results in response to Project Search.

values.description: Array of ProjectSearchResult objects for matched documents.

fieldName.description: Display name of the field higlighted.

fieldReferenceName.description: Reference name of the field highlighted.

hits.description: Highlighted snippets of fields that match the search request.

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '3.1-preview' to use this version of the api.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
